Title: Requires training in suicide risk assessment and intervention
Summary: Requires licensed mental health counselors, psychologists, other certified or licensed counseling professionals and emergency services personnel to complete training in suicide risk assessment and intervention.
LawCode: Amd §§7603 & 7704, Ed L; amd §§158 & 840, Exec L; amd §3052, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, the executive law and the public health law, in relation to requiring licensed mental health counselors, psychologists, other certified or licensed counseling professionals and emergency services personnel to complete training in suicide risk assessment and intervention
